title: The Starry Night
description: A swirling night sky over a quiet village with a prominent church spire

title: The Scream
description: An agonized figure against a landscape with a tumultuous orange sky

description: Serene pond surface with floating water lilies in soft, peaceful colors

description: Surreal landscape with melting clocks draped over objects

title: Sunflowers
description: Vibrant yellow sunflowers in a vase, radiating warmth and joy

title: Guernica
description: Powerful anti-war painting depicting the bombing of Guernica

description: Dark and disturbing depiction of the god Saturn eating his child

title: The Night Café
description: Harsh interior of a café with clashing colors expressing tension
